categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Gebnerret Vibrion was a Human male senator who represented the planet Ghorman and Sern sector in the Imperial Senate.

In 0 BBY, he was later arrested and imprisoned by the Galactic Empire in an interrogation center on the planet Selnesh; he was eventually rescued by members of a Rebel Alliance commando team led by Koris Haslam. In 2 ABY, Vibrion suffered from Zithrom's syndrome and required large doses of Clondex to survive.
